long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pause Block - Delay distracting websites.

This extension allows you to delay or block distracting websites.

Available Modes:
- Blacklist: the extension will be applied to Domains listed in Domain List.
- Whitelist: he extension will be applied to all domains NOT listed in Domain List

Options to personalize the delay time and increment, with the option to automatically redirect to the website after the time or create a link for the user to manually click it. 

Timetable to enable the extension only at specifics days/times.
